project_overview.title: Interactive Multi-Theme Portfolio Website
project_overview.description: Build a highly interactive, visually stunning portfolio website for an Industrial Engineering student specializing in AI and Data Science, who is also a skilled graphic designer. The portfolio must seamlessly blend technical sophistication with creative design excellence.

core_technologies.frontend: React.js with TypeScript for type safety and component reusability
core_technologies.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom animations and Framer Motion for interactions
core_technologies.routing: React Router for seamless navigation between sections
core_technologies.state_management: React Context API or Zustand for theme switching and data management
core_technologies.animations: GSAP, Framer Motion, and Three.js for 3D elements

performance.requirement: Lazy loading for images and components
Optimized bundle size with code splitting

landing_page.concept: Interactive hero section with particles or 3D geometric shapes

elements.element: Three clickable portals/doors leading to each section
Cursor trail or custom cursor design

menu_style.option: Floating navigation bubble that follows cursor
Morphing hamburger menu with smooth page transitions
Side navigation with section previews on hover

section_one.theme_description: Pinterest-inspired masonry grid with artistic flair. This section should feel like walking through a digital art gallery with unexpected interactions at every corner.

color_palette.primary: Vibrant gradients (sunset orange to purple, neon blues to pinks)

layout.grid_type: Responsive masonry grid using CSS Grid or React Masonry

card_behavior.on_hover: Cards lift with 3D transform, cast shadows, reveal quick info
card_behavior.on_click: Expand into fullscreen lightbox with project details
card_behavior.loading: Stagger animation - cards appear one by one with bounce effect

interactive_features.feature: Filter tags that animate when selected (graphic design, branding, UI/UX, illustration)
Infinite scroll with smooth loading animations
Image zoom on hover with smooth transitions
Color-based filtering (click a color palette to filter projects)
Drag to reorder favorite projects
Like/favorite system with heart animation
Share button for individual projects

special_effects.effect: Liquid/blob cursor that changes color based on section

section_two.theme_description: Clean, professional, and data-driven. This section showcases technical competence with interactive charts, timelines, and project demonstrations. Think modern tech company meets academic excellence.

color_palette.accent: Cyan, mint green for highlights and data visualizations

layout.structure: Dashboard-inspired layout with cards and widgets

subsection.content: Professional photo, elevator pitch, key skills
subsection.visual: Animated skill bars or radial progress charts

subsection.interaction: Click timeline nodes to expand education/experience details

subsection.cards: Project cards with tech stack badges
subsection.filter: Filter by technology (Python, TensorFlow, React, etc.)

subsection.visualization: Interactive skill constellation or radar chart
subsection.categories: AI/ML, Data Science, Programming Languages, Tools, Soft Skills

subsection.display: Card carousel with certificate images and validation links

interactive_features.feature: Interactive timeline that animates on scroll
Clickable project cards that open detailed case studies
Live GitHub integration showing commit activity
Animated statistics (projects completed, lines of code, skills mastered)
Tech stack filter with smooth transitions
Code snippets with syntax highlighting for key projects
Embedded project demos or videos
Downloadable project reports

project_card_structure.element: Tech stack badges (React, Python, TensorFlow, etc.)
GitHub/Live demo links with icon buttons

content.item: Interactive data visualizations or model outputs

special_effects.effect: Code editor aesthetic with monospace fonts
Neural network visualization as background element

section_three.theme_description: Warm, authentic, and human. This section reveals personality through photos, stories, and experiences. Think Instagram meets personal blog with a touch of nostalgia and playfulness.

color_palette.primary: Warm earth tones (terracotta, sage green, cream)
color_palette.accent: Gold, copper for highlights and borders

layout.structure: Scrapbook/collage inspired layout with organic shapes

subsection.content: Candid photos, fun facts, personality traits
subsection.interaction: Flip cards revealing different aspects of personality

subsection.layout: Polaroid-style photo grid with tilted angles
subsection.interaction: Click to enlarge, drag to reposition photos
Hover for description and related photos

subsection.visual: Timeline with photos and short stories

subsection.map: Interactive world map highlighting visited places
subsection.interaction: Click location pins to see photos and stories

subsection.display: Rotating carousel of favorite quotes and life philosophies

interactive_features.feature: Photo collage that rearranges on page load
Polaroid photos with handwritten-style captions
Mood board/vision board section with draggable elements
Interactive world map with travel stories
Music player with favorite playlist
"A day in my life" animated timeline

photo_presentation.hover_effect: Photo lifts up and straightens slightly

global_interactive_elements.feature: Smooth page transitions with creative loading animations
Theme switcher with smooth color transitions (dark/light mode)
Custom cursor that changes per section
Easter eggs (hidden interactive elements for engaged visitors)
Floating contact button accessible from all sections

contact_section.interaction: Slide-in contact form with smooth animation

mobile.requirement: Hamburger menu with smooth slide-in navigation

Create base layout and theme system
Build landing page with animated hero
Develop Graphic Design section with masonry grid
Create Academic/Professional section with timeline and projects
Design Personal Life section with photo gallery

coding_guidelines.principle: Write clean, modular, and reusable components
Follow React best practices and hooks patterns
Optimize for performance with lazy loading and code splitting
Use CSS-in-JS or Tailwind for consistent styling

success_criteria.criterion: Visitor engagement: Average session time > 2 minutes
Mobile responsiveness: Perfect rendering on all screen sizes
Loading performance: First contentful paint < 2 seconds
Impression: "Wow factor" that makes visitors remember the portfolio
